item.title: Expensive WI Supreme Court Seat Already Paying Off For Wealthy Leftist Donors
item.description: The cemented left-led court has upheld Democrat Gov. Tony Evers’ veto trick to increase public school funding for the next four centuries.

item.title: The Courts Are The Scofflaws Behind Our Current Constitutional Crisis
item.description: The Supreme Court’s double standard suggests it is not prudence dictating the outcome. It is also not the Constitution.

item.title: Art Shouldn’t Get A Free Nudity Pass Just Because It’s Art
item.description: The fact that celebrated works from the past contain nudity doesn’t justify us including it in our films, literature, and other mediums.

item.title: RFK Jr.’s Quest To Discover Autism Causes Will Help Restore Americans’ Trust In Science
item.description: Not only does science need to be correct to be effective, but it also needs to be perceived to be correct.
